features: 100% Blackout Curtains: One package contains 2 panels. Each panel is 50 inches wide and 84 inches long, Each panel sewn with 3" rod pocket and contains 8 back loops, the elegant design and 100% blackout functionality make it suitable for bedrooms, living room, dining room, office, nursery, kitchens, farmhouse and more.

Linen Blackout Curtains: The black out curtains has black liner, which are made of 100% polyester and it is thick enough and aesthetic. Blackout curtains feature a double-layer design, that makes room darkening, turning day into night and give you a perfect environment to sleep.

3-in-1 Ways to Hang: The top design of the curtain is multifunctional, allowing you to make a variety of hanging choices: (1) With Back Tab (8 back loops per panel). (2) With Rod Pocket (3" rod pocket top style fits most of rods). (3) With Clip Rings (the curtain clip rings are not included).

Thermal Insulate: The black curtains for bedroom can block 100% sunlight and balance the temperature for your house, which are thermal insulate against heat and cold, noise reduction and provide privacy protection, create a comfortable environment for your family.

Care Instructions: Machine washable in cold water. Do not bleach (use only non-chlorine bleach if necessary). Warm iron and tumble dry at low temperatures. If you have any question on our product, feel free to contact us and we will reply and assist you within 12 hours.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 🌑 100% Blackout Shield Curtains - Stylish Elegance with Unmatched Light Control! 🌙🏡
reviews.reviewText: Enhance your bedroom's ambiance with the 100% Blackout Shield Blackout Curtains, a set that combines style and functionality to create a serene sleeping environment.Crafted for optimal light control, these blackout curtains boast a 100% blackout shield. The faux linen fabric, coupled with a black liner, ensures complete darkness, creating an ideal setting for restful sleep. Enjoy the luxury of undisturbed nights with these curtains that effectively block out external light sources.Measuring 96 inches in length, these curtains add a touch of sophistication to your bedroom decor. The stone blue color complements a variety of design styles, creating a stylish and serene atmosphere in your sleeping space.The back tab/rod pocket design enhances the overall aesthetics of the curtains while offering versatility in hanging options. This thoughtful design allows you to choose between a clean, modern look with back tabs or a classic appearance with the rod pocket, ensuring that the curtains seamlessly integrate into your existing decor.In addition to their stylish appearance, these curtains provide thermal insulation. The thermal properties help regulate the temperature in your bedroom, keeping it comfortable year-round. Enjoy energy efficiency and a cozy atmosphere with these curtains that go beyond just light control.Overall, the 100% Blackout Shield Blackout Curtains are a perfect blend of stylish elegance and unmatched light control. Elevate your bedroom's ambiance with these curtains that offer complete darkness, a stylish design, and practical thermal insulation. 🌑🌙🏡

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good color, good light blocking, not a fan of the plasticky backing
reviews.reviewText: First, if you’re only looking at the front side of these, I think they are pretty good curtains. I prefer a heavier, linen look, and these fall somewhere between the really expensive ones and the cheap ones that say blackout, but aren’t really. You can see in some of the pictures that the fabric drapes nicely, there’s a bit of a faux-linen look (although there’s not really any texture to it), and there is a blackout coating on the back that is *actually* blackout. That being said, I won’t be using these as I prefer a fabric blackout lining and this is sort of a plasticized coating. I realize this is a sensory sensitivity thing, but I really don’t like the way they feel or sound when pulling them closed, and I think a fabric backing gives a fuller look and insulates more, so my search continues.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfectly fit the bill as a photography/videography backdrop
reviews.reviewText: I'm guessing the company who made these curtains didn't have this in mind when they made them, but I find these perfect for use as a neutral background for shooting photos and video.For my purpose, the fact that they're lightweight is a plus...as is the fact the black backside blocks out competing light sources.I chose the grey because it's a shade that can easily appear lighter or darker in the background, depending on how the background scene is lit...or not lit.The loops on the back of the curtains make them easy to install. And I was impressed by how wrinkle-free they are, even after being packaged away in a plastic container for the journey to my house.I actually could have used one more panel to make the backdrop even wider, but I guess there's a way to do that--like purchase another one!I actually could have used one more panel to make the backdrop even wider, but I guess there's a way to do that--like get another one!I'm sure I'm not the first to see the value of using these curtains in this way, but if you're inspired to try it yourself, I think you'll be pleased.Oh. And they're also a nice curtain.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Just blackout, very flimsy
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Fabric isn't suited for my bedroom I hoped it would be but it's like the mid century modern fabric you see everywhere. I had blackout/temp reg drapes from a discount retailer that were very high quality so I was surprised these were so flimsy. I also was not aware that despite Vine letting me place another order for them (so I could actually use the curtains) and taking away my option to get anything else in place they didn't end up sending me another set nor was I aware. I was not going to pay what they were charging for these as they are just not the quality I am looking for. I was not aware the fabric was not a solid grey either as the picture did not do it justice. In the end I had to put them in between two old curtains I have to replace and will need to replace them all. Also they have slots to hang them through and that would have made them even longer and they are very long now. The material is very thin, black on the other side which I don't like ( they make blackout curtains that are not black on one side) I can't recommend them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for curtains that were insulating and light-blocking for my son's first apartment living room, and these will suit just fine. It was really tricky choosing which of the several shades of beige that are offered was the right tone, but I think the "Natural" that we ultimately decided on was the right call. I was looking for something in a true-neutral to slightly warm-neutral to work with his furniture, and this is pretty close. If you're also not sure which one to go with, scrolling over the color options on my PC in a browser helped a lot in better seeing the difference in the tones. The fabric on the front feels like canvas or a stout tweed more than linen, but the look is pretty good. I was surprised by the (plastic?) backing, but not really put-off by it as I didn't find it altered how the curtains look when hung and don't really care if it looks like the curtains look like they're solid black from the outside. I didn't find them to be a true "blackout," like I would want if I were trying to sleep during the day. But for darkening a living room so there's no glare on the TV or your laptop screen, these handle that with ease. Overall, they're what we were hoping they would be and are satisfied with them.Bonus points for not having grommets and instead having rod pocket, tab, or clip options for hanging.
